name: Hammer of Hephaestus
printed_effect:
The Empowered Elestral gets +1 {attack}
for each Enchanted Rune on your field.
As long as Hephaestus is Enchanted
the Empowered Elestral cannot be
targeted by an opponent’s Elestral effect.
effect: The Empowered Elestral gets +1 {attack} for each Enchanted Rune on your field. While Hephaestus is Enchanted the Empowered Elestral cannot be targeted by opponents’ Elestral effects.
